accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag244, wcag412, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT6.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.4.4, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
Ensure aria-braillelabel and aria-brailleroledescription have a non-braille equivalent
Ensure every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.aria, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT6.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
Ensure elements do not use deprecated roles
Ensure aria-hidden=""true"" is not present on the document body.
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.aria, wcag2a, wcag131, wcag412, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.3.1, EN-9.4.1.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.name-role-value, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT6.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every ARIA input field has an accessible name
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.aria, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT5.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
Ensure every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
Ensure every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.aria, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT5.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values
Ensure attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
Ensure <blink> elements are not used
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.time-and-media, wcag2a, wcag222, section508, section508.22.j, TTv5, TT2.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.2.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure buttons have discernible text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.name-role-value, wcag2a, wcag412, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT6.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.keyboard, wcag2a, wcag241, section508, section508.22.o, TTv5, TT9.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.4.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.color, wcag2aa, wcag143, TTv5, TT13.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.4.3, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <dl> elements are structured correctly
Ensure <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
Ensure each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag242, TTv5, TT12.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.4.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
Ensure form field does not have multiple label elements
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.forms, wcag2a, wcag332, TTv5, TT5.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.3.3.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.keyboard, wcag2a, wcag211, TTv5, TT4.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.1.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT12.d, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag412, section508, section508.22.i, TTv5, TT12.d, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.language, wcag2a, wcag311, TTv5, TT11.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.3.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.language, wcag2a, wcag311, TTv5, TT11.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.3.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.language, wcag2a, wcag311, EN-301-549, EN-9.3.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag111, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT7.a, TT7.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure input buttons have discernible text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.name-role-value, wcag2a, wcag412, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT5.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <input type=""image""> elements have alternate text

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure every form element has a label
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.forms, wcag2a, wcag412, section508, section508.22.n, TTv5, TT5.c, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.color, wcag2a, wcag141, TTv5, TT13.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.4.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure links have discernible text

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly
Ensure <li> elements are used semantically
Ensure <marquee> elements are not used
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.parsing, wcag2a, wcag222, TTv5, TT2.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.2.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <meta http-equiv=""refresh""> is not used for delayed refresh
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.time-and-media, wcag2a, wcag221, TTv5, TT8.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.2.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <meta name=""viewport""> does not disable text scaling and zooming
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.sensory-and-visual-cues, wcag2aa, wcag144, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.4.4, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.keyboard, wcag2a, wcag412, TTv5, TT6.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.4.1.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.time-and-media, wcag2a, wcag142, TTv5, TT2.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.4.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <object> elements have alternate text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag111, section508, section508.22.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.1.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure [role=""img""] elements have alternate text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag111, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT7.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure select element has an accessible name

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that server-side image maps are not used
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag211, section508, section508.22.f, TTv5, TT4.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.2.1.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag111, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT7.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.1.1, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.tables, wcag2a, wcag131, section508, section508.22.g, TTv5, TT14.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.3.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.tables, wcag2a, wcag131, section508, section508.22.g, TTv5, TT14.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.3.1

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.language, wcag2aa, wcag312, TTv5, TT11.b, EN-301-549, EN-9.3.1.2, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure <video> elements have captions
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.text-alternatives, wcag2a, wcag122, section508, section508.22.a, TTv5, TT17.a, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.2.2

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.forms, wcag21aa, wcag135, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.3.5, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
accessibilityRules.Tags: cat.structure, wcag21aa, wcag1412, EN-301-549, EN-9.1.4.12, ACT

accessibilityRules.Description: Ensure touch targets have sufficient size and space
Ensure every accesskey attribute value is unique
Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
Ensure every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
Ensure role=""text"" is used on elements with no focusable descendants
Ensure every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
Ensure headings have discernible text
Ensure table headers have discernible text
Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level
Ensure the main landmark is at top level
Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
Ensure the document has at most one main landmark
Ensure the document has a main landmark
Ensure landmarks are unique
Ensure <meta name=""viewport""> can scale a significant amount
Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
Ensure the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA enhanced contrast ratio thresholds
Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
Ensure <meta http-equiv=""refresh""> is not used for delayed refresh
